entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
